## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributor Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] I have followed the [Flutter Style Guide](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/wiki/Style-guide-for-Flutter-repo).
- [ ] `flutter analyze` produces zero issues.
- [ ] `dart format --line-length 100 --set-exit-if-changed .` passes.
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works.
- [ ] `flutter test` passes.
- [ ] I have updated documentation (`///` dartdoc) for any new or changed public API.
- [ ] `dart doc --validate-links` produces zero warnings.
- [ ] I have updated `CHANGELOG.md` if this is a user-facing change.
